title: No Regrets
description: What happens when you live your life believing in no regrets?Life hasn't been perfect for plus sized Deborah Hansen. Still reeling from her grandmother's death, her increasing pile of debt, and finally graduating college, she decides its time to pursue her dream of becoming a fashion designer. Working as a tailor in a fine department store isn't high on her list, but it has its perks and she meets one in the form of a man she calls "Mr. Sexy". William King isn't just any sexy man though, he's the ultra-private billionaire heir to a fortune Deborah knows nothing about.When Will's mysterious past puts the two lovers in danger, will the truth bring them closer together or finally tear them apart?
author: Liliana Rhodes
